ARABIC: وَمَا عَلَّمْنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعْرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لَهُۥٓ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ وَقُرْءَانٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We did not teach him poetry nor would it be right for him. It is simply a reminder and a clear Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have not taught (Muhammad) to versify, nor is it worthy of him. This is nothing but a reminder and illuminating discourse,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We did not teach him (to wit, the Messenger) poetry and it does not behove him. This is none but an Admonition, and a Clear Book
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We did not teach him (Muhammad) poetry, nor was he supposed to be a poet. It is only the word (of God) and the illustrious Quran
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We have not taught him (Prophet Mohammed- peace and blessings be upon him) to recite poetry, nor does it befit him; it is nothing but an advice and the bright Qur’an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have not taught him poetry, nor is it suitable for him. This is only a Reminder and a plain Qur'an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We have not taught him poetry, nor is it meet for him; it is nothing but a reminder and a plain Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have not taught him poetry; it is not seemly for him. It is only a Remembrance and a Clear Koran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have not taught him (Muhammad) poetry, nor is it meet for him. This is naught else than a Reminder and a Lecture making plain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have not taught him any poetry nor would it be fitting for him. This is merely a Reminder and a clear Quran
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have not taught him poetry, nor it befitteth him. This is but an admonition and a Recital luminous:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We did not teach him poetry, nor does it behoove him. This is just a reminder and a manifest Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have not instructed the (Prophet) in Poetry, nor is it meet for him: this is no less than a Message and a Qur'an making things clear:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have not taught him (Muhammad SAW) poetry, nor is it meet for him. This is only a Reminder and a plain Quran.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have not taught him (Prophet Muhammad) poetry, nor does it become him. This is only a Remembrance and a Clear Holy Reading (Koran)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We did not teach him poetry, nor is it proper for him. It is only a reminder, and a Clear Quran.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:69] And We did not teach him, that is, the Prophet, poetry — this was [revealed] to refute their saying, ‘This Qur’ān that he has brought is but poetry!’ — nor is it, poetry, seemly, [nor is it] facilitated, for him. It — that which he has brought — is just Remembrance, an admonition, and a Qur’ān that clarifies, that manifests [God’s] rulings and other matters;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And we have not taught him) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (poetry, nor is it meet for him) poetry is not appropriate for him. (This is) i.e. the Qur'an (naught else than a Reminder) an admonition (and a Lecture making plain) the lawful and unlawful, the commands and prohibitions,
